name: Union Carrier

2 monsters with the same Type or Attribute
Cannot be used as a Link Material during the turn it was Link Summoned. You can target 1 face-up monster you control; equip 1 monster with the same original Type or Attribute as that target from your hand or Deck to it with this effect:
‚óè It gains 1000 ATK.
If you equipped a monster from the Deck with this effect, you cannot Special Summon a monster with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Union Carrier" once per turn.
